name: Landscape Generator
description:
This is a landscape generator that allows the player to enter the game and view different types of landscapes. Each type of landscape holds different resources such as fruits and plants, and each landscape have their own textures! This generator also allows you to fill water and niches into your customer landscape. 

You can generate an underwater mountain landscape that has some seaweed and other marine plants in it, or you can create a lower valley landscape that grows crops such as cabbages and mushrooms! 

Controls:

WASD - camera movement 

C -  Mountain Landscape 

V -  Valley Landscape
